Sits 5 comfortably having 4 doors with plenty of trunk space accessible with hatchback
The rear seats lay down giving even more space 

Asking $3,500 obo
Located in Jefferson, NC

Title: 2009 Toyota RAV4 AWD, V6, 7 seats
Description:
A rare find.  We ordered this Toyota from Modern Toyota of Boone to get three things: 1) made in Japan (the best reliability), 2) V6 engine - 269 HP, and 3) 3rd row (seats 7).  You cannot get any of that in a RAV4 now.  No V6. No 3rd row.  None of the gas RAV4's are made in Japan now.  Serviced regularly at Modern Toyota/Subaru except for 3 years in Raleigh.  It has been a very reliable family car for us.  No accidents, but we did crack the bumpers by bumping trees and posts.  We replaced both bumpers and added stainless steel rails to protect the new bumpers.  Within the last few months, we had several things fixed to prepare the car for sale - water pump, master brake cylinder, wheel bearings, and a tire pressure sensor.  Prior to those repairs, the only non-maintenance repairs (brake pads, rotors, etc.) that we had were the water pump (a weakness in this V6 engine) and an emissions sensor.  Not bad for 13+ years and almost 176,000 miles.  We have and can share service receipts back to 2009.

The car accelerates and drives very well.  It has no mechanical issues as far as we know, and we have had it checked thoroughly at Modern Subaru.  The after-market fog lights are not working because we cannot find a replacement relay for them.  But - because there's always a "but" - our RAV4 is very rusty underneath and on two rear panels (see photos).  They use a lot of salt on the roads where we live.  If you are comfortable dealing with rust, this could be a great car for you.

If you are interested in the car, text us at the number below.  It might take a while, but we will get back to you.

Eight 2 Eight - Four 1 Four - Fifteen twenty

Title: 2004 Cadillac SRX V8 (Runs drives, body and axle damage)
Description:
Clean title, clean interior Cadillac SRX, involved in single vehicle collision (~20mph passenger side). Non-smoker. Runs and drives, not highway worthy in current condition. 4.6L Northstar V8 (~330hp) original engine with no CELs, premium gas required, will throw engine code and cut timing if using less than 91 octane. Damage is limited to passenger front bumper/quaterpanel/axle/suspension and rear passenger rear quarterpanel. Will require new washer tank, new turn signal housing, and likely suspension/axle work. Also willing to part out car if able to come to premises and pull parts. Prices listed below: you break it, you buy it. Cash preferred, transaction will be conducted at local bank.

Engine+trans+ecu+misc. wiring components=$1k
Interior (all interior components)=$1k
Wheels+tires (tires <1k miles) (all)=$500
Body panels+headlights/taillights (each)=$70
Suspension/brakes/axles/frame components (each)= $70

Title: 4runner

Title: 2009 Subaru Outback
Description: Selling my Outback and upgrading to a new Oynx.  Well maintained, 133,000 miles, and records on maintenance available. Purchased  July 2019 with 104,000 miles and the prior owner noted car was in accident and insurance totaled due to cost of repair. They performed repairs on front right side.  Car checked out and has been dependable for past 3 years aside for expected maintenance.  Tires (Dec 2019)  , all major gaskets (head, valve and exhaust), motor mount, radiator done in March 2021. Regular oil changes. Selling 'as is'.

Title: 2004 Subaru Forester 2.5 XS Premium
Description:
Good condition, aside from a few minor cosmetic issues (photos included) as well as the following:
-Check engine light is on due to needing a new O2 sensor (not a necessity)
-A/C doesn't work, but heat works fine. (Needs new A/C compressor) 
-Drivers side power window motor is on its way out (doesn't go up and down as fast as it once did but still works)
-A few rust spots on passenger side and undercarriage, but nothing crazy

Clean title, will definitely pass inspection, and engine runs great! 
Second owner, original car manual included along with maintenance records since time of purchase.
Original floor mats, after market all-weather rubber floor mats, carjack kit, and full-size spare tire also included.
Very well maintained, oil changes every 6,000 miles without fail. (leaks a little oil, but negligible amount)
**Head Gaskets replaced at 110,000 miles, along with spark plugs.
Rear wheel bearings recently replaced, as well as all four rotors and pads, and brand-new brake lines.
Tires are fairly new also, Goodyear Assurance All-Seasons with 70%+ tread.

My wife and I love this vehicle, and are sad to let it go. We've made it through many a blizzard, and I would still trust this Subi with my life. Best vehicle I have ever driven in the snow, hands down. This thing is a tank and has many more miles left in her. 

Willing to include 4 like-new (215/60R16 Bridgestone Blizzak) snow tires with purchase for an extra $450 (firm).

Cash or cashier's/certified checks accepted. 

Calling is preferable  show contact info
